node_2: crucial vantage point dominating the army's main supply line.
edge: Assigned to secure this position during the hostilities.
Point 5179 is a crucial vantage point dominating the army's main supply line, which is the National Highway 1D.
Karan's battalion decides to attack from the eastern side as the other sides of the mountain are perilous to cross, which is along the National Highway 1D.
The battalion decides to attack from the eastern side.
A group of twelve officers and soldiers (including Karan) are ordered by Colonel Damle to scale a 1000-foot rock cliff on the western side.
Karan's assault during the night successfully captures the Pakistani position.
Romi goes to Kargil as a war correspondent.
Romi meets a changed Karan in Kargil.
